creditor_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the major creditor account.

account_number.description: The account number of the major creditor account.

name.description: major_creditors name where the creditor account type is 'MJ' or 'CF'

awaiting_payout.description: This is the sum of all payment transactions that have been paid by the defendants which has not been paid out to the major creditor. So transaction_amount in creditor_transactions that are related to the major creditor where payment_processed is FALSE and transaction_type = 'PAYMNT'
